tooltip.ntm.dr_breens_private_reserve2: I don't even know how I got here.

tooltip.ntm.ptsd_medication1: This isn't even PTSD medication, it's just

tooltip.ntm.rad_x: Increases radiation resistance by 0.2 (37%) for 3 minutes

tooltip.ntm.stylish_flask4: Smells like disinfectant, tastes like disinfectant.
